data.name: Half Built: Casino
data.detailed_description:
Half Built: Casino is the new casino tycoon game from Short Olive Games. Build your dream casino. Do it yourself or hire a crew of builders to help you out.

Build your favorite games. Slots, Pokers, Craps, Blackjack, roulette, and more to come. Hire Dealers to help you succeed.



Provide services to your guests. Keep their stomachs full and their bladders empty. Provide guests drinks to help increase bet size.



Take loans from the mob to keep growing but don't miss a payment! Miss too many payments and they will come after you!



Hire Entertainers and build a stage. Shows will bring extra guests who will stick around and try their luck.

Too much money on hand? Build a vault to keep it all stored. Watch out for thieves!



Research new items and unlock new options.



Join us now in Early Access and watch the game grow and have your say on potential new content.

A world-class legitimate enterprise or a seedy backroom game room? The choice is yours with Half Built: Casino!

data.short_description: Half Built: Casino is the ultimate casino tycoon game. Start from scratch and build your dream casino. Take loans from the mob to keep growing but don't miss a payment! A world-class legitimate enterprise or a seedy backroom game room? The choice is yours with Half Built: Casino!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
